title: World War II: Global Conflict and Allied Victory

vocab.definition: Global conflict from 1939-1945 between Axis and Allied powers
Alliance of Germany, Italy, and Japan during WWII
Alliance including Britain, Soviet Union, and United States
Systematic persecution and murder of Jews by Nazi Germany
Allied invasion of Nazi-occupied France on June 6, 1944

teachingNotes: Emphasize the global scope of the conflict and its humanitarian consequences. Discuss the importance of Allied cooperation.

sample.question: What was the global conflict from 1939-1945?

truefalse.question: The Axis powers included Germany, Italy, and Japan.

multiplechoice.question: What was the Allied invasion of France called?

fillintheblank.question: The systematic persecution of Jews was called the ________.

shortanswer.question: What factors led to Allied victory in WWII?
